metadata.name: Suspicious PowerShell Invocations - Specific - ProcessCreation
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-nop')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -w ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hidden')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('[convert]::frombase64string')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -w ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hidden')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-noni')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-nop')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -c ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iex')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('new-object')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -w ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hidden')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-ep')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bypass')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-enc')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('reg')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('add')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\software\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('bypass')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-noprofile')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-windowstyle')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('hidden')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('system.net.webclient')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.download')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('iex')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('new-object')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('net.webclient')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.download'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('(new-object system.net.webclient).downloadstring(\'https://community.chocolatey.org/install.ps1')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('write-chocolateywarning'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious PowerShell invocation command parameters
